ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Use passwd for changing passwords.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Webmin must use passwd for password changes so that password requirements configured in the operating system are enforced on new password selections.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
passwd is configured for changing passwords.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Enable the ability for a user to change an expired password.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Webmin must enable a user to change their password when it has expired.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Changing expired passwords is enabled.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Use PAM for Unix authentication.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Webmin must use the OS-provided Password Authentication Module for validating passwords.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
perl-Authen-PAM is installed.
Require PAM to be used.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Installed operating system is part of the Unix family
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The operating system installed on the system is part of the Unix OS family

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Webmin
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The application installed on the system is webmin

ns0:extend_definition.comment: Installed OS is part of the Unix family

ns0:criterion.comment: Webmin is installed

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Prevent users from covering their trail.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: User actions must be tracked.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Prevent users from covering their trail.

ns0:metadata.ns0:description: User actions must be tracked.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Require passwords to include at least 1 upper-case character, 1 lower-case character, 1 numeric character, and 1 special character.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Passwords created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must include at least 1 upper-case character, 1 lower-case character, 1 numeric character, and 1 special character.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Require passwords to include at least 1 upper-case character, 1 lower-case character, 1 numeric character, and 1 special character.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Set default permissions for new user home directories.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: New users created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must have the default permissions of 750 applied to their home directory when created.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Set default permissions for new user home directories.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Configure new accounts to lock out after a number of days of no activity.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: New users created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must include required account expiration criteria.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Changing expired passwords is enabled.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Display last login information.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: User last login information must be displayed to support detecting unauthorized access.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Display last login information.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Configure new accounts to expire their password after a maximum number days.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: New users created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must include required maximum password life criteria.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Configure new accounts to expire their password after a maximum number days.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Configure new accounts to prevent changing the password more than once per number of days.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: New users created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must include required minimum password life criteria.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Configure new accounts to prevent changing the password more than once per number of days.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Passwords include the required minimum character length.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Passwords created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must include the minimum defined number of characters in the password.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Passwords include the required minimum character length.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Selected passwords are not based on dictionary words.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Passwords created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must not include dictionary words.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Selected passwords are not based on dictionary words.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Passwords are stored using the required hash algorithm.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Passwords generated through the UserAdmin Webmin module must be stored using the specified hashing algorithm.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Passwords are stored using the required hash algorithm.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Password characters entered are not displayed in clear text.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The UserAdmin Webmin module must not display the characters entered for the password in clear text.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Password characters entered are not displayed in clear text.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: A password is not the same as the previously used password.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Passwords created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must not be the same as the previous password used.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
A password is not the same as the previously used password.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Configure new accounts to warn the user about their password expiring.
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: New users created through the UserAdmin Webmin module must include required account password expiration warning criteria.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Configure new accounts to warn the user about their password expiring.

ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Display approved login banner prior to login.

ns0:criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Prevent the ability for a user to save their login credentials for future access.
